verses.roman:
pratāparudrera eka āchaye niyame
yata dina rahe teṅha śrī-puruṣottame

synonyms: pratāparudrera—of King Pratāparudra; eka—one; āchaye—is; niyame—a regular duty; yata dina—as long as; rahe—remained; teṅha—he; śrī-puruṣottame—at Jagannātha Purī.
translation: As long as King Pratāparudra stayed in his capital, Puruṣottama, he performed one regular duty.
